question_en: Which is NOT included in '3R' under the Basic Act for Establishing a Recycling-Based Society?
explanation_en: 3R consists of Reduce, Reuse, and Recycle.

question_en: Under the Antique Business Law, within how many days must a 'change notification' be submitted?
explanation_en: Must notify the Public Safety Commission within 14 days.

question_en: Which item requires identity verification even if total purchase is under 10,000 yen?
explanation_en: Game software, books, CD/DVD, motorcycles require ID verification.

question_en: When an antique dealer ceases business, by when must the license be returned?
explanation_en: Must return within 10 days from the date of cessation.

question_en: What is the penalty for operating antique business without a license?
option1_en: Up to 1 year prison or up to 500,000 yen fine
option2_en: Up to 3 years prison or up to 1,000,000 yen fine
option3_en: Up to 6 months prison or up to 300,000 yen fine
explanation_en: Unlicensed operation: up to 3 years prison or up to 1,000,000 yen fine.

question_en: Which is NOT in the 13 categories of 'antiques' under the Antique Business Law?
explanation_en: Medical equipment is not in the 13 antique categories.

question_en: Which is a 'disqualification reason' for antique dealer license?
explanation_en: Person without fixed residence is disqualified.

question_en: Which statement about store 'managers' is correct?
explanation_en: Each store must have one designated manager.

question_en: When dealing multiple antique categories, what should the store sign display?
explanation_en: When handling 2+ categories, display only one main category.

question_en: At what amount does identity verification become mandatory when purchasing antiques?
explanation_en: ID verification required when total is 10,000 yen or more.

question_en: Which exception item requires ID verification even under 10,000 yen?
explanation_en: Books, game software, CD/DVD, motorcycles require ID verification.

question_en: What information is needed for signature during in-person ID verification?
explanation_en: 4 items needed: address, name, occupation, age.

question_en: What to do when suspecting antiques are stolen goods?
option2_en: Refuse purchase and let customer leave
explanation_en: Must report to police immediately when suspecting stolen goods.

question_en: What crime applies when knowingly selling counterfeit brand goods?
explanation_en: Knowingly selling counterfeits constitutes fraud.

question_en: How many digits must the license number displayed on website have for online antique business?
explanation_en: Must display Public Safety Commission name and 12-digit license number.

question_en: Deadline for notification when starting/changing/ending online antique business?
explanation_en: URL notification must be within 14 days after start or change.

question_en: Which items require recording buyer's address and name when selling antiques?
explanation_en: Recording needed for: art, watches/jewelry, automobiles, motorcycles.

question_en: What must be carried when doing mobile purchasing (visiting customers)?
option2_en: Antique license or mobile employee ID
explanation_en: Must carry license or mobile employee ID card.

question_en: Deadline for notifying police when opening temporary store for purchasing?
explanation_en: Must notify local police station 3 days before business day.

question_en: How long is the cooling-off period for door-to-door purchasing?
explanation_en: Can cancel unconditionally within 8 days from receiving document.

question_en: Which item is NOT subject to door-to-door purchase regulations (no cooling-off)?
explanation_en: Furniture, large appliances, books, CD/DVD are not subject to regulations.

question_en: How long must police 'stolen goods notice' be kept?
explanation_en: Must record receipt date and keep for 6 months.

question_en: How long can victims request free return of stolen goods?
explanation_en: Victims can request free return within 2 years from theft.

question_en: Which case does NOT require license reissuance?
explanation_en: Manager change only needs change notification, not license reissuance.

question_en: Which Antique Business Law violation can result in business suspension?
explanation_en: Not following directive orders can result in business suspension.

question_en: Which ID verification method is NOT accepted for non-face-to-face purchases?
option1_en: Send registered mail to recipient only and confirm delivery
explanation_en: Only sending license copy is insufficient, must combine with registered mail.

question_en: What to do when records (transaction documents) are lost or damaged?
option3_en: Rewrite from memory in new book
explanation_en: Must report to police chief immediately when records are lost.

question_en: When antique dealer buys at auction in good faith but item is stolen, what can be claimed?
option3_en: Return if compensated for price paid
explanation_en: At auction purchase, can request compensation for price paid before returning.

question_en: Which statement about police 'stolen goods notice' is INCORRECT?
option3_en: Must report immediately if matching item found
option4_en: Violation only results in suspension, no penalty
explanation_en: Violation can result in up to 6 months prison or up to 300,000 yen fine.

question_en: Which statement about police on-site inspection is correct?
option1_en: Cannot enter without business owner consent
option3_en: Refusal may result in up to 100,000 yen fine
explanation_en: No right to refuse police inspection; refusal results in up to 100,000 yen fine.

question_en: Maximum duration of police hold order when suspecting stolen antiques?
explanation_en: Hold order period is within 30 days.

question_en: Which is NOT among the 4 items under Home Appliance Recycling Law?
explanation_en: 4 appliances: AC, TV, refrigerator/freezer, washer/dryer. Microwave not included.

question_en: How is disposal handled for PC with PC Recycling Mark?
option2_en: Can dispose as bulky waste to local government
option3_en: Must pay recycling fee at post office
explanation_en: PC with recycling mark can be collected without new fee.

question_en: Which item cannot be sold without PSC Mark under Consumer Product Safety Law?
explanation_en: Home pressure cooker, motorcycle helmet cannot be sold without PSC mark.

question_en: Which item is 'Special Specified Product' (diamond shape) with higher danger in PSC mark?
explanation_en: Kerosene heater, oil equipment, baby beds are Special Specified Products (diamond).

question_en: Amount threshold for high-risk transactions requiring records under Crime Proceeds Transfer Prevention Law?
explanation_en: Applies to cash transactions over 2,000,000 yen for precious metals.

question_en: What is prohibited when reuse shop visits customer's home to purchase?
option1_en: Requesting sale of items not pre-arranged
explanation_en: Prohibited: unannounced visits or soliciting items not pre-arranged.

question_en: How long can consumer exercise right to refuse delivery in door-to-door purchase?
explanation_en: Can refuse delivery during cooling-off period.

question_en: Which item is subject to door-to-door purchase regulations (cooling-off applicable)?
explanation_en: Automobiles, furniture, appliances, books, CD exempt; precious metals are subject.

question_en: How long after license revocation before antique dealer can reapply?
explanation_en: Cannot apply for license within 5 years after revocation.

question_en: Which does NOT fit the definition of 'antiques' under Antique Business Law?
option4_en: Waste that cannot serve original purpose
explanation_en: Waste that cannot serve original purpose is not antiques.

question_en: Under Product Liability Law, who is responsible when used item sold at reuse shop causes house fire?
explanation_en: Manufacturer is principally responsible. However, if processed or imported, may be subject.

question_en: When can personal information be provided to third party without consent?
option1_en: To send DM to affiliated company
explanation_en: Can provide without consent when required by law (police investigation).

question_en: What is the correct obligation of online auction business operator (Type 3)?
option1_en: Report to police when stolen goods found listed
option2_en: Verify seller ID with original driver's license
explanation_en: Auction intermediary must report to police when suspecting stolen goods.

question_en: Where can antique dealer conduct mobile business?
explanation_en: Mobile business (home purchasing) permitted at customer's address or residence.

question_en: When operating temporary store, besides local police, where else can notification be made?
explanation_en: With Public Safety Commission license, can operate in other prefectures with notification only.

question_en: What to do when old license found after reissuance due to loss?
explanation_en: Must promptly return old license with reason statement.

question_en: Which Antique Business Law violation results in up to 6 months prison or up to 300,000 yen fine?
explanation_en: Record-keeping or notice retention violation: up to 6 months prison or 300,000 yen fine.

question_en: Which case does NOT require license return?
option3_en: When old license found after reissuance
explanation_en: Temporary suspension doesn't require return (but over 6 months may lead to revocation).

question_en: What must be displayed on homepage when antique dealer opens website for transactions?
option3_en: Public Safety Commission name and license number
explanation_en: Must display licensing Public Safety Commission name and 12-digit license number.

question_en: Which is NOT classified as antiques?
explanation_en: Garden stones, empty cans, scrap metal not antiques (gift certificates are antiques).

question_en: Is buying goods abroad and selling at own store in Japan antique business?
option4_en: Yes if selling price 10,000 yen or more
explanation_en: Buying abroad yourself and selling is not antique business.

question_en: In 3R for Reuse exam, what has highest priority?
explanation_en: Generally 3R prioritized: Reduce > Reuse > Recycle.

question_en: What business can antique market operator (Type 2) conduct?
option2_en: Operating market for trading between antique dealers
explanation_en: Antique market operator runs market for antique dealers to trade with each other.

question_en: What is main business of antique auction intermediary (Type 3)?
explanation_en: Business providing antique trading system (auction) via internet.

question_en: Whose residence certificate copy is needed for license application?
explanation_en: For corporations, need copies for all officers (including auditors) and store managers.

question_en: How many years cannot apply for license after fine for Antique Business Law violation?
explanation_en: Cannot apply for 5 years after fine for certain crimes (theft, Antique Business Law violation).

question_en: Deadline for change notification when changing store manager?
explanation_en: Manager change must be notified to Public Safety Commission via police within 14 days.

question_en: What is penalty for name lending (letting others operate under your license)?
option4_en: Up to 3 years prison or up to 1,000,000 yen fine
explanation_en: Name lending or unlicensed operation: heaviest penalty of up to 3 years or 1,000,000 yen.

question_en: When purchasing antiques from corporation, what information needed about transaction handler?
explanation_en: Even for corporations, need handler's address, name, age, occupation.

question_en: When reuse shop sells motorcycle, which is NOT required in records?
explanation_en: Sale records: date, item name/quantity/characteristics, counterparty's address/name/age/occupation.

question_en: Is antique dealer license needed when buying antiques and selling disassembled parts?
explanation_en: Buying antiques and selling usable parts is antique business.

question_en: Is antique dealer license needed when selling used office equipment to employees cheaply?
explanation_en: Selling own used items is not business, no license needed.

question_en: Is antique dealer license needed when selling free appliances after repair?
explanation_en: Items received free (not purchased) is not antique business.

question_en: What must employees carry when antique dealer conducts mobile business?
explanation_en: Employees must carry mobile employee ID card for mobile business.

question_en: What is validity period of mobile employee ID card?
explanation_en: No legal validity period, but must collect when employee leaves.

question_en: Deadline for change notification when antique dealer changes website URL?
explanation_en: URL change also needs notification within 14 days after change.

question_en: Which case requires license reissuance application?
explanation_en: Reissuance needed when license lost or damaged. Others handled by change notification.

question_en: What is the record-keeping method under Antique Business Law?
explanation_en: If meeting certain conditions, can record and keep by computer.

question_en: Which case is exempt from record-keeping obligation?
explanation_en: Under 10,000 yen exempt from recording except certain exception items.

question_en: What happens when antique dealer violates business suspension order and continues operating?
explanation_en: Violating suspension order is grounds for license revocation.

question_en: Who must stolen goods be reported to?
explanation_en: Must report to police immediately when suspecting stolen goods.

question_en: Must stolen goods notice be kept even if no matching items?
explanation_en: Even without matching items, must record receipt date and keep 6 months.

question_en: What to note when minor (unmarried) sells antiques?
explanation_en: Minor's legal acts need legal representative consent; also note youth protection ordinances.

question_en: What obligation does online auction operator have when stolen goods found listed?
option1_en: Obligation to report to police (including best effort)
explanation_en: Auction intermediary must make best effort to report to police when suspecting stolen goods.

question_en: Which transactions are subject to Specified Commercial Transactions Law?
explanation_en: Internet sales (mail order) or door-to-door purchasing subject to Specified Commercial Transactions Law.

question_en: Which is NOT required display under Specified Commercial Transactions Law on online sales website?
explanation_en: Must display business name, address, phone, price, payment timing, delivery timing.

question_en: What happens to original owner when door-to-door purchaser sells to third party during cooling-off?
option2_en: Can claim return from third party
explanation_en: During cooling-off, if transferred to third party, consumer can claim return from that third party.

question_en: Can home appliances without PSE mark (Electrical Appliance Safety Law) be sold?
explanation_en: Products under Electrical Appliance Safety Law cannot be sold (including display) without PSE mark.

question_en: What is difference between Specified Products and Special Specified Products under Consumer Product Safety Law (PSC mark)?
explanation_en: Specified Products have round PSC mark; Special Specified Products with higher danger have diamond PSC mark.

question_en: What category is lighter (disposable type) under PSC mark system?
explanation_en: Lighters designated as Special Specified Product, requiring diamond PSC mark.

question_en: What PSC mark shape needed when selling kerosene heater?
explanation_en: Kerosene heater is Special Specified Product, needs diamond PSC mark.

question_en: What license needed when reuse shop sells medical equipment?
explanation_en: To sell managed medical equipment, need notification or license under Pharmaceutical and Medical Device Law besides antique license.

question_en: Amount threshold for high-risk transactions requiring ID and transaction records under Crime Proceeds Transfer Prevention Law?
explanation_en: Applies to cash transactions over 2,000,000 yen for precious metals.

question_en: What document must be issued to disposer when collecting 4 appliances under Home Appliance Recycling Law?
explanation_en: When collecting 4 target items, must issue recycling ticket (manifest) and keep copy.

question_en: Who pays recycling collection fee when disposing old PC without PC Recycling Mark?
explanation_en: PC without mark, disposer (owner) pays recycling collection fee at disposal.

question_en: Which is personal identification code under Personal Information Protection Law?
explanation_en: Fingerprint, vein authentication, My Number, driver's license number, passport number are personal identification codes.

question_en: Besides Antique Business Law violation, what can result in antique dealer license revocation?
explanation_en: If convicted of certain crimes like theft, fraud, Antique Business Law violation and fined, license may be revoked.
